name: Save The Piece!
description:
Save The Piece is a short take on the endless runner genre. Although this game is not an endless runner, it plays like one in that once the player is hit, the level restarts.  It's meant to be a fast paced, fun game that can be quickly played in spurts.

Controls: Up, Down, Left, Right

The Evil have taken over the land and it is your job to save the piece!
